segments.text: Hello . Dr . Brown ’ s Dental Office . How can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi , this is Susan Smith . I ’ m calling about my appointment with Doctor Brown today at 3
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I got the flu . I have a fever and a headache . Can I cancel my appointment ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure , you can , but you ’ ll be charged for $ 10 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , there ’ s a charge ? Why ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is for the delayed cancellation . Because this time is reserved for you . If you are unable to keep an appointment , you should notify us 48 hours in advance . Otherwise , the charge will be made .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . That ’ s ok . I ’ ll pay .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks for your understanding . Do you want to make another appointment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . Not right now . When I feel better I ’ ll call you again .
segments.speaker: S2
